# 2025 GENERAL SPORTS OFFER PRODUCT FACT FILE ![img-0.jpeg](img-0.jpeg) ___ The image features a rhythmic gymnast in mid-performance, showcasing an elegant pose. The gymnast is wearing a sparkling, intricately designed costume that is predominantly pink and adorned with sequins. Notably, instead of a head, there is a large, shiny pink ball positioned where the head would typically be, creating a surreal effect. The background is a soft, neutral color that emphasizes the gymnast's movements and costume. ___ ![img-1.jpeg](img-1.jpeg) ___ The image features a text layout with the year "2025" prominently displayed at the top in a large, bold font. Below that, the words "GENERAL S" are visible, likely part of a larger phrase or title. At the bottom, the text reads "PRODUCT FACT FIL," which seems to be cut off, suggesting it might continue with the word "FILE." The background appears to be a mix of black and light blue. ___ # 2025 SPORTS FEED SERVICE PRODUCT FACT FILE # SPORTS FEED SERVICE ## EDITORIAL FORMAT - A real-time sports news feed - Production available in 6 languages: French, English, German, Spanish, Arabic and Portuguese - Hourly coverage: 24/7, in real time - Non-regionalised feed | Description | Sports coverage | | --- | --- | | Sports events | Football, cycling, cricket, Formula 1, rugby, tennis, athletics, basketball, golf, handball, swimming and much more… | | Sports extras | Football, cycling, cricket, Formula 1, rugby, tennis, athletics, basketball, golf, handball, swimming and much more… | ## *Ratio per language for annual production in 2024** ![img-2.jpeg](img-2.jpeg) ___ The image is a pie chart illustrating the distribution of stories published per day in various languages. The total number of stories is noted as 292, excluding updates. The segments of the pie chart are color-coded to represent different languages: - **Arabic**: 35% (blue) - **German**: 5% (light blue) - **English**: 20% (red) - **Spanish**: 14% (orange) - **French**: 16% (purple) - **Portuguese**: 10% (yellow) Each segment's percentage indicates the proportion of stories published in that language relative to the total. ___ | SUBSCRIPTION | DELIVERY METHODS | | --- | --- | | Monthly subscription | Via satellite or FTP for direct integration into the customer's system API AFP News | | New | *Average volume from January to December 2024 **Average over one year, given as an indication, likely to vary according to current events | # 2025 ## SID SPORTS TEXT SERVICE PRODUCT FACT FILE # SID SPORTS TEXT Service ## EDITORIAL FORMAT - Aimed at a German-speaking media, corporate and institutional clientele living mainly in Germany or in Europe and looking for rich coverage of sports news. - German correspondents present in Paris, Brussels, Washington, Istanbul. - Hourly coverage: 24/7 in real time. ## COVERAGE - Rich coverage of sports relating to themes: football, tennis, athletics, etc. - Sporting information managed by the SID office based in Cologne, aimed primarily at a German-speaking clientele looking for German sports news in real time. - Focus on German sports and the performance of German athletes. - The feed also covers other sports as well as the main national and special events ![img-3.jpeg](img-3.jpeg) ## COVERAGE DETAIL** - Athletics - Basketball - Cyclism - Handball - Motor sports - Ski - Football - Tennis - Olympics ## PRODUCT FORMATS - Delivery of metadata: XML, NewsML and jpg, if the story includes photos. ## SUBSCRIPTION - Monthly subscription to the complete feed or to a selection within the feed ## DELIVERY METHODS - FTP or satellite - AFP - Forum - SIDForum - API *Average volume from January to December 2024 **Average over one year, given as an indication, likely to vary according to current events # 2025 ## SPORTING INFORMATION FEED IN ARABIC (ARB SPORT) PRODUCT FACT FILE # SPORTING INFORMATION FEED IN ARABIC ## "ARB SPORT" EDITION ### EDITORIAL FORMAT - Aimed at Arabic-speaking customers interested in world and regional sports news. - Validated by the Nicosia desk. - AFP has Arabic-speaking sports editors writing in Arabic, present in all countries of the region. - Hourly coverage: 6am to 10pm GMT, 7 days a week, in real time. ### COVERAGE - Rich coverage of sports relating to themes: football, tennis, athletics, motor racing sports, etc. - The feed also covers other sports as well as the main special, national and international (football World Cup, etc.) events. | Forecasts | Time (GMT) ___ The image is a pie chart representing the distribution of various sports. Each segment of the pie is labeled with a percentage, indicating the proportion of interest or participation in each sport. - The largest segment, colored blue, represents "Football" at 57%. - Other segments include: - "Athletics" (light blue) at 2% - "Basketball" (black) at 7% - "Cycling" (gray) at 3% - "Handball" (yellow) at 6% - "Motor sports" (purple) at 6% - "Ski" (light purple) at 6% - "Tennis" (green) at 5% - "Olympics" (orange) at 8% Each sport is represented by a different color, and the chart provides a visual comparison of their relative popularity or participation rates. ___ | DELIVERY METHODS | | --- | --- | --- | | "Sports forecast menu" | 11:30am | Forecasts on ARB Sport service themes: football, athletics, tennis, basketball. | ### Coverage details** ![img-4.jpeg](img-4.jpeg) | PRODUCT FORMATS | SUBSCRIPTION | DELIVERY METHODS | | --- | --- | --- | | NewsML-G2, IIM, NewsML-1.1, ANPA | Monthly subscription to the full service or to the section. | API Satellite or FTP AFP News | **Average volume from January to December 2024* **Average over one year, given as an indication, likely to vary according to current events* # 2025 SPORTS PHOTO SERVICE PRODUCT FACT FILE # SPORTS PHOTO SERVICE ## EDITORIAL FORMAT - Pictures captioned in English and classified according to IPTC norms. - The number of pictures can reach 1,200 per day during weekends or for major special events. - Coverage: 24/7, in real-time ## Sports coverage Sports events Sports extras ## Description Football, cycling, cricket, Formula 1, rugby, tennis, athletics, basketball, golf, handball, swimming and much more... Sporting Institutions (IOC, FIFA, federations, clubs, athletes, sponsors) ___ The image consists of a pie chart and some text. The text on the left states "30* Reports per day (excluding updates)" in a large font. The pie chart on the right is divided into several segments, each representing different sports and their corresponding percentages of reports. The segments are color-coded and labeled as follows: - **Athletics** (purple) - 2% - **Basketball** (light blue) - 8% - **Motor sports** (orange) - 7% - **Football** (blue) - 67% - **Tennis** (red) - 7% - **Olympics** (light orange) - 9% The chart visually emphasizes that the majority of reports are related to football, while the other sports have significantly lower percentages. ___ . Other themes relating to sport such as doping, justice, people, etc. ## Coverage details** ![img-5.jpeg](img-5.jpeg) PRODUCT FORMATS - Image size via satellite: 1.5 MB - Image size via FTP: - 1.5 MB - Formats via AFP Forum: 512 pixels, 768 pixels or original size - 800 KB for Africa SUBSCRIPTION - One-shot sales - Quota, with or without over quota - Photo feed (annual subscription) ___ The image presents a visual representation of data regarding the number of photos taken per day, totaling 1,490. It features a pie chart that categorizes these photos by different sports. Each category is represented by a distinct color and percentage: - **Football**: 39% - **Athletics**: 22% - **Motor sports**: 11% - **Basketball**: 7% - **Cycling**: 4% - **Cricket**: 3% - **Rugby**: 3% - **Tennis**: 2% - **Olympics**: 9% The chart effectively illustrates the distribution of photos across various sports, highlighting football as the most photographed sport. ___ ## DELIVERY METHODS - Regionalised feeds available via satellite or FTP - API - AFP News # 2025 INFOGRAPHICS & VIDEOGRAPHICS SPORTS ## PRODUCT FACT FILE ![img-6.jpeg](img-6.jpeg) ___ The image features a logo with a bright yellow background. It includes the letters "AFP" in blue, followed by a blue circle, and the word "Sports" in black. The design is simple and bold, emphasizing the "AFP" and "Sports" text. ___ # SPORTS INFOGRAPHICS & VIDEOGRAPHICS SERVICE ## SPORTS INFOGRAPHICS ### EDITORIAL FORMAT - Graphics combining information, images and data - Production available in 6 languages: French, English, Arabic, Spanish, German and Portuguese | Sports coverage | Description | | --- | --- | | Sports events | Systematic coverage of major Sports events: football World cup and Champions’ League, Olympic Summer and Winter Games, Tour de France, Formula One presentation On merit coverage of major sports development: record breaking, sport legends career summary… | | Sports extras | Explainer on new technologies and innovations in sports, on doping issues… | ### *Ratio per language for annual production in 2024** ![img-7.jpeg](img-7.jpeg) | PRODUCT FORMATS | SUBSCRIPTION | DELIVERY METHODS | | --- | --- | --- | | .AI .PNG (standard or retina) .JPEG (standard or retina) .PDF EPS .JPEG | One-shot sales Quota, with or without over-quota Infographics feed (annual subscription) ___ The image is a pie chart illustrating the distribution of infographics created per day in different languages. The chart is divided into five segments, each representing a language: - **German**: 24% (yellow) - **English**: 24% (purple) - **Spanish**: 21% (light blue) - **French**: 16% (orange) - **Portuguese**: 15% (blue) Next to the pie chart, there is a statement indicating that an average of 6 infographics are produced per day. ___ Also available via Online News via FTP for direct integration | Regionalised feeds available via satellite or FTP API AFP News | **Average volume from January to December 2024* **Average over one year, given as an indication, likely to vary according to current events like Olympics* # SPORTS INFOGRAPHICS & VIDEOGRAPHICS SERVICE ## SPORTS VIDEOGRAPHICS ### EDITORIAL FORMAT - Videographics combine text, images, video and 3D modelling elements with audio voice-over and a separate dopesheet - Formats dedicated to digital and audiovisual media: TV, online editors, mobiles, tablets, public screens… Available in 6 languages: English, Spanish, French, German, Arabic, and Portuguese - Separate audio voice-over and script - Ready to publish format or editable format for translation and integration into your story. | Sports coverage | Description | | --- | --- | | Sports events | Systematic coverage of special events: Winter and Summer Olympic Games, FIFA World Cup | | Sports extras | Focus on new technologies and innovations in sports, including in Formula 1 | ### *Ratio per language for annual production in 2024** ![img-8.jpeg](img-8.jpeg) ___ The image is a pie chart illustrating the distribution of videographics produced per year in different languages. The chart indicates a total of 75 videographics, with the following percentages for each language: - **German**: 4% - **English**: 27% - **Spanish**: 28% - **French**: 16% - **Portuguese**: 25% The chart uses distinct colors to represent each language, making it easy to visualize the proportions. The title "75* videographics per year" is prominently displayed at the top. ___ ## PRODUCT FORMATS - JPEG - Adobe Flash [16:9] 640x360 (.f4v) - MPEG4 H.264 [16:9] 1280x720 (.mp4) - MPEG4 H.264 [16:9] 640x360 (.mp4) - MPEG2 [4:3] 720x576 (.mp2) - One-shot sales - Quota, with or without over-quota - Videographics feed (annual subscription) - Also available via Online News via FTP for direct integration ## DELIVERY METHODS - Regionalised feeds available via satellite or FTP - API - AFP News **Average volume from January to December 2024** **Average over one year, given as an indication, likely to vary according to current events like Olympics** # 2025 SPORTS DATA FEED PRODUCT FACT FILE # SPORTS DATA FEED ## EDITORIAL FORMAT ## The largest catalogue of sports data More than 2,000 streams of sporting results covered per year Sporting data and performance statistics on the main matches and all competitions in real time Reliable, accurate and timely feeds, suitable for all types of media Available in 18 languages including French, English, German, Spanish, Italian, Chinese and Portuguese Other languages available | Sports coverage | Description | | :-- | :-- | | Football | Domestic leagues, international cups, European
competitions | | Formula 1 | World championship | | Cycling | World championship | | Rugby | World Cup, Top 14, Pro D2, Champions Cup, 6 Nations | | Basketball | NBA, Euroleague, Europe Cup, EuroCup, World Cup | | Olympic Games | Summer and Winter Games | | Tennis | ATP / WTA, Billie Jean King Cup and Davis Cup | | Athletics | World Athletics meetings, World Championships, Diamond
League | | Volleyball | Women's and Men's European Volleyball Championships | PRODUCT FORMATS SUBSCRIPTION DELIVERY METHODS XML JSON One or several competitions / sports. One-off events (one-shot) Widgets Via API, for optimal integration Database-to-database replication # 2025 AFPTV SPORTS FR \& EN PRODUCT FACT FILE # AFPTV SPORTS IN FRENCH ## EDITORIAL FORMAT - Raw images with or without sound. - Fully edited video reports - Video length: from 30 seconds to 4 minutes / profiles and features : up to 10 minutes - Intended for broadcasters, production companies and other media - Product to be edited by the client ## COVERAGE - News and big competitions - Press conferences, training sessions, fan reactions, business, etc. - European football championships (Ligue 1, Liga, EPL), Champions League, Europa League (final) - Special events: Football World Cup, Olympic and Paralympic Games... - Red Bull Media House provides editorial content on a wide range of sporting disciplines from racing to esports and extreme sports in various locations around the world: 250 photos and 15 videos per month - Original reports and illustrative images | SLUG | Product | Edited sequences | Voice-over | Sound bite dubbing | Extra rushes | Script | Editable sequences | Sepxounds

ready-to-use articles ## EDITORIAL FORMAT - Automatic integration of articles into the client's site: - Integration of articles in real time in chronological order for easy and complete online access - Customised content integration to suit the client's content and upload preferences - Multiple editorial and technical formats for optimised adaptation to all digital media: web and mobile sites, public screens and any other interactive information medium and connected TV. ## ADDED VALUE - Productivity gains for media departments for non-core topics, thanks to instant publication of content and continuous feed to web and mobile sites - Sections adapted to suit each production language - Unique metadata to index and reference each news story ## AVAILABLE I ANGUAGES - Service available in 9 languages: French, English, German, Spanish, Arabic, Portuguese, simplified and traditional Chinese. 108 *Articles illustrated per day (all languages) ___ The image contains text presented in a clean, modern design. The second section mentions "+ 300* editable videos per month." 3. The third section highlights "130 video production points worldwide."
